channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump flips and re-nominates Jared Isaacman to lead NASA
item.description: The reversal comes after weeks of pressure from people like Elon Musk, who accused Transportation Secretary Sean Duffy of being ill-equipped for the j...

item.title: NVIDIA, Qualcomm join U.S., Indian VCs to help build India’s next deep tech startups
item.description: Qualcomm Ventures has joined six Indian venture firms, collectively adding more than $850 million to boost India’s deep-tech ecosystem.

item.title: Meze Audio 105 Silva Headphones Review: Look Great, Sound Better
item.description: These open-back headphones are no good for your commute, but sure make staying at home fun.

item.title: Feeling the Effects of the Time Change? We Asked Experts How to Get Back on Track
item.description: The end of daylight saving time is disruptive to circadian rhythms, but there are some things you can do to help yourself reset.

item.title: Blood Tests for Alzheimer’s Are Here
item.description: New diagnostic kits aim to revolutionize early screening of the disease, potentially allowing patients to receive treatments—such as monoclonal antibo...

item.title: Whisper Into This AI-Powered Smart Ring to Organize Your Thoughts
item.description: A new company called Sandbar has unveiled a smart wearable called Stream Ring, which uses a microphone to record your softly spoken thoughts. And it’s...

item.title: Goldman Sachs doubles down on MoEngage in new round to fuel global expansion
item.description: MoEngage already has customers across 75 countries, with North America being its biggest business driver.

item.title: Former Meta employees launch a ring to take voice notes and control music
item.description: A raft of voice-based hardware devices have emerged, aimed at companionship, productivity, or personal growth. These include card-shaped devices from ...

item.title: The CIA Used This Psychic Meditation Program. It’s Never Been More Popular
item.description: The Monroe Institute claims its meditations, which have also been used by the US military, help people access different planes of consciousness. Its v...

item.title: Amazon sends legal threats to Perplexity over agentic browsing
item.description: Amazon won't allow agents on its site that don't identify themselves as such. Perplexity is not pleased.
